interview_details.introduction: Hello, I'm from (your company), an independent marketing research company. We're conducting a survey with women about various consumer products. Ask to speak to female 18+ years or older.

questions.question_text: Into which of the following age groups does your age belong?

instructions.18_24: Check quota to determine if needed
instructions.over_quota: Ask for another female in age group needed

questions.question_text: Which of the following products do you use daily?
questions.instructions: Continue only if cigarettes checked above in Q.2. Otherwise, if none, terminate, erase and re-use.

questions.question_text: Which of the following brands have you used in the past week?
